message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am confident it will bring significant benefits to your endeavors. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a remarkable opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a favorable price. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
